name: unity-commands-core
description: Commands have an Execute method that may contain arbitrarily complex behaviour. Commands are generally wired to execute in response to a Notification (see beatthat/unity-notifications)
author: larrykirschner@gmail.com

scripts.install:test: rm -f *.tgz npm cache clear && yarn cache clean && yarn pack --filename test-pkg.tgz && cd test && npm run clean && yarn install --force
